name: Spot the Diff 3D
description:
★ The very first Spot the Difference game in 3D!
It's not the Spot the Difference game like you've seen before!
You have to rotate the screen in the 3D world to find the answers.

★ Compete through the Challenge Mode
Clear the 5 random stages faster than anyone else and register your score on the Leaderboard to compete with others.

★ Animation and zoom in feature
The characters in each stage have broken through their static images with simple animations.
Use the zoom in feature during the game.

★ Stages divided into 5 themes
Play each stage in 5 cute or cool themes such as Monster, Western, City, and so on.

★ Raise Hint Pets
Cats, dogs, and turtles help your gameplay in different ways.
They'll find the correct answer for you or adjust the time for you. Level up to improve your abilities.★ The very first Spot the Difference game in 3D!
